item.title: A dashboard for my home server
item.description: I have a few services running on my home server, so I set up a simple web page with links to each service. To generate (static) content, I decided to use pandoc to generate html from a Markdown file. I used Nginx to serve the web page. Installing Nginx and pandoc Simple! Since we’re on Debian $ sudo apt install nginx pandoc net-tools I included net-tools for diagnostics.
